tags.description: Nui Dat (Núi Đất) is a former 1st Australian Task Force (1 ATF) base now part of Ba Ria city in Ba Ria–Vung Tau province, Vietnam. In 1966, when the area was part of the then Phuoc Tuy Province it was the location of a prominent 1 ATF military base.
tags.name: Nui dat

tags.description: A memorial to the Battle of Long Tan that took place in a rubber plantation near Long Tan on 18 August 1966. This is a replica of the original cross.
tags.name: Long Tan Cross
